p: From this perspective, the essay is structured in three sections, in addition to this introduction. The first one proposes a brief discussion about the ecovillages as a global movement and the development notion itself. In the second one, transition horizons are discussed from a post-development and intercultural perspective, focusing on ecovillages’ social meanings and practices in relation to systemic alternatives principles of the pluriverse of community-led initiatives. A synthesis of this reflection, constitutes the last third section.
